_instructions: This file contains ground truth labels for gameplay screenshots. Save your screenshots to pc-1080p/ folder and fill in the detected items below.

level_33_early_game_english.png.notes: Early game, clean UI, minimal effects. Good baseline test.

level_803_late_game_russian.png.notes: STRESS TEST: 70+ items, 3 inventory rows, Russian text, late game. Perfect for testing detection limits.

level_52_mid_game_spanish.png.notes: Mid-game, Spanish localization, moderate item count with combat effects.

level_281_late_game_turkish_boss.png.notes: Boss fight, heavy visual effects, Turkish localization, FPS counter visible. Tests detection during visual chaos.

_testing_instructions.1_save_screenshots: Save the 4 screenshots from the chat to test-images/gameplay/pc-1080p/ with the filenames listed above
_testing_instructions.2_open_app: Open the MegaBonk Complete Guide app in browser (bun run dev)
_testing_instructions.3_navigate_to_scan: Go to Advisor tab > Build Scanner section
_testing_instructions.4_upload_screenshot: Click 'Upload Screenshot' and select one of the saved images
_testing_instructions.5_run_detection: Click 'Hybrid: OCR + CV (Phase 3)' button to run detection
_testing_instructions.6_compare_results: Compare detected items with ground truth above
_testing_instructions.7_calculate_accuracy: Use browser console to run: window.testUtils.calculateAccuracyMetrics(detectedItems, groundTruthArray)
_testing_instructions.8_iterate: Adjust OCR/CV parameters based on accuracy, then retest

_accuracy_targets.baseline: Screenshot 1 (early game, clean UI) should achieve >80% accuracy
_accuracy_targets.item_count_detection: Should detect x2, x3 counts with >70% accuracy
